tenants.roleAssignDesc: Below are the available tenant roles you can assign to a user. A checkmark shows roles currently assigned to this user. Select additional role(s) to update their permissions.

errors.nonNewStatusChange: Requests can only have a status change from New. Start a new request instead
errors.nameExists: Tenant Request cannot be approved because the name already exists

tenants.addAnotherUser: Add a user to this tenant | Add another user to this tenant | Add another user to this tenant

groups.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{groupName}"?
groups.sharedServicesDesc: Click 'Edit' to start assigning roles. Choose the roles you want to add to your Group from each available {servicesLabel}, then click 'Save' to apply your changes.
groups.sharedServicesSavedDesc: The roles for this group have been successfully updated.
groups.sharedServicesSaveErrorDesc: There was an error updating the roles {error}. Please try again.
groups.undoRoleModalDesc: You're about to undo your current selections and restore the previously assigned roles. Are you sure you want to continue?
groups.clearAllRoleModalDesc: You're about to delete all of your current role selections. Are you sure you want to continue?

general.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in to continue.
general.sessionExpiredDesc: For security reasons, CSTAR automatically logs you out after a period of inactivity.

users.offboardUserMessage: This action will remove this user's tenant and group memberships. They will no longer have access to any systems using CSTAR.
